name: Codota AI Autocomplete for Java and JavaScript
description:
<Important!

Codota is no longer supported and is now part of Tabnine!
Please go ahead and install Tabnine instead, and enjoy our next-generation AI models which provide whole-line and full-function code completions. Tabnine.com.
notes:
• 4.2.5 - Fixed 2021.1 compatibility.
  • 4.2.4 - Fixed EAP compatibility.
  • 4.2.3 - Bug fixing.
  • 4.2.2 - Bug fixing and improving the "Installing type packages" process.
  • 4.2.1 - Performance improvements.
  • 4.2.0 - Performance improvements.
  • 4.1.17 - Bug fixing.
  • 4.1.16 - Add telemetry option to the settings.
  • 4.1.15 - Performance improvements
  • 4.1.14 - More strict criteria to display Snippet suggestions ("codota:") in new line.
  • 4.1.13 - More New Line completions with assignment (CA). Start phasing out inline completions.
  • 4.1.12 - Deep completions in Java comments (CA)
  • 4.1.11 - Early method completions (CA)
  • 4.1.10 - Do not show suggestions which are not in the classpath.
  • 4.1.9 - Bug fixing.
  • 4.1.8 - Deep Completions for Java (all users).
  • 4.1.7 - Deep Completions for Java (CA).
  • 4.1.6 - Bug fixing.
  • 4.1.5 - Bug fixing.
  • 4.1.4 - Adjust to IJ 2020.1 (EAP) (3rd and last batch)
  • 4.1.3 - Adjust to IJ 2020.1 (EAP) (2nd batch)
  • 4.1.2 - Adjust to IJ 2020.1 (EAP)
  • 4.1.1 - Fix IDE freeze in Deep Completions for javascript
  • 4.1.0 - New minor version, supports version 2019 or higher; WS Freeze fix.
  • 4.0.0 - New major version, supports version 2018.3 or higher.
  • 3.0.43 - The last version supporting versions < 2018.3 on a regular basis.
